dictionary.Прошло много времени с тех пор как джава: Long time passed since JavaScript become mainstream.

dictionary.Не смотря на многочисленные попытки, до: Despite multiple attempts, there is still no right single way to write code in this language.

dictionary.Каждый использует его своим специальным: Everybody is using it in their own special way and most people still fill that they are failing to tame the language.

Look at that code. You did't know that. I know so I am smarter then you.

dictionary.Все эти разговоры немного скучные потому: All this talks are kinda boring, because they are not very useful.

dictionary.Моя речь будет такой же но я хочу принес: My talk will be sort of similar but I want to bring a message to you.

dictionary.Я расскажу вам, как я придумал идею гово: I'll tell you how I came up with idea to talk about javascript language.

dictionary.Я знаю много языков. Паскаль, С++ и нако: I know many languages. Pascal, C++ and finally jumped to javascript.

dictionary.У меня было очень хорошее понимание того: I had very good understanding of how the javascript code should be written. And I was completely wrong.

dictionary.Javascript ударил меня в спину много мно: Javascript hit me in back many many time before I finally understood.

dictionary.Но даже теперь я не уверен, что понимаю: But even now I am not sure that I understood javascript completely.

dictionary.Кто здесь думает, что знает Javascript о: Who is there thinking know javascript very well?

dictionary.OK. Пара заблуждающихся человек. Но боль: Ok. The couple misguided people. But most people are not so confident.

dictionary.Я хочу, чтобы вы подумали... Остановитес: What I want you to think... Stop for a moment. Forget about react and angular. Think about pure javascript.

dictionary.Каким он должен быть? Что такое правильн: What it should be like? What is the proper way of javascript.

Javascript is very flexible as you all know. We could write code in many different ways.

dictionary.И я здесь не для того, чтобы научить вас: And I am not here to teach you how to write javascript the right way. There is no right way.

dictionary.Те, кто не знает, что они ходят во тьме,: Those who are unaware they are walking in darkness will never seek the light.

dictionary.Я хочу сказать, что JavaScript-это Брюс: I'd like to say that javascript is Bruce Lee of programming languages. Because it's flexible, it's powerful and it changed the hole picture.

dictionary.Я хочу (своего рода) указать вам на неко: I want to (sort of) point you to some of the things that you may be haven't seen before or maybe didn't think about them
